context: Spotify Technology S.A. is a audio streaming platform focused on music streaming, podcasts, and audiobooks. European streaming leader. US launch preparation.

competitors.name: Pandora
competitors.notes: Pioneer internet radio since 2000, Music Genome Project personalization

competitors.name: Rdio
competitors.notes: Launched Aug 2010 by Skype founders, direct Spotify competitor

competitors.name: iTunes
competitors.notes: Apple's music download store, not yet streaming
